data.title: CROATIA'S SECESSION FROM THE SFRY AND THE SERBO-CROATIAN WAR
data.meta_description: The International Journal of Innovative Technologies in Social Science is a double-blind peer-reviewed, international scientific Open Access journal, that publishes articles containing original research, reviews, covering subjects in social science. The journal is divided into 12 subject sub-areas. The journal will consider articles in the following subjects: Anthropology (archaeology, physical or biological anthropology, anthropological linguistics, and cultural anthropology); Geography (human geography and physical geography); Sociology; Communication studies; Political science; Culture; History; Philosophy; Laws; Linguistics; Education; Psychology.
